original_title: Things That Go Bump in the Night: Tales of Haunted New England
overview: Things That Go Bump in the Night: Tales of Haunted New England takes you on a journey throughout historic New England collecting tales of the supernatural, the unexplained, and the mysterious â€” spooky stories of ghosts, spirits, witches... and even a vampire!
tagline: New England is a region full of beauty and history, but it also hides a dark heritage that many speak about in tales 'round the campfire on a crisp autumn evening...
title: Things That Go Bump in the Night: Tales of Haunted New England
